title: Camogli
description: These photographs will accompany an upcoming book about the history of women's health in Morocco. All were taken at l'Hôpital de Maternité et Santé Reproductrice les Orangers.

photos.caption: Rabat, Morocco, 2024
photos.description: Doctor discussing medical information with a patient in the hospital corridor.

photos.description: Waiting room in the maternity ward.
